task.title: View a List of Apps
task.shortdesc: The Apps List page provides access to all of your existing Livefyre Apps.

context.p: The Apps List page displays the following information:

ul.li: Title: lists your App’s title, and includes an icon indicating the App type.
Site: lists the App’s location, by site.
Content Count: lists the number of pieces of content published to the App.
Date Modified: lists the last time the App was changed in App Designer.
Embed Code (</>): click the icon to generate the embed code for your App.
